properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 9:35PM CST until February 21 at 9:25PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Tombigbee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* until Friday February 21.
* At 8 PM Tuesday the stage was 14.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Maximum forecast stage of 17.1 feet will be on Wednesday February 19.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Tuesday February 18 and will
continue rising to near 17.1 feet by Wednesday February 19. The
river will fall below flood stage Friday February 21.
* At 17.0 feet...Water is flowing over portions of Hood Road and
extensive agricultural flooding is occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Wednesday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
